item.title: Build php5.5 with fpm on ubuntu linux
item.description: In this article Iâ€™m gonna give a quick guide on building and installing php5.5 with FastCGI Process Manager on Linux. I did test it on Ubuntu 12.04 but it should work on nearly any Linux distribution out there. Get the source-code
